howtoinvestfordummies.model.adapter

Class AbstractStockAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • howtoinvestfordummies.model.adapter.AbstractStockAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStockAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalStockAdapterImpl, RemoteStockAdapterImpl

    public abstract class AbstractStockAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStockAdapter
    Abstract adapter to perform common implementation for all the adapters implementing IStockAdapter. Other methods are abstracted at this level.

      • getDateInString

        protected java.lang.String getDateInString(java.util.Date date)
        Parses Date object and converts it into required String format. This method converts Date in String of format yyyy-mm-dd.
        Parameters:
        date - of type Date.
        Returns:
        date value in string.

      • getStockPriceForBuying

        public abstract double getStockPriceForBuying(java.lang.String symbol,
                                              java.util.Date date)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns buying price for the symbol at a given date.
        Specified by:
        getStockPriceForBuying in interface IStockAdapter
        Parameters:
        symbol - of the company for which stock needs to be bought.
        date - for which price needs to be fetched.
        Returns:
        price of type double.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case price was not found or symbol is incorrect.

      • getStockPriceForCalculatingValue

        public abstract double getStockPriceForCalculatingValue(java.lang.String stockSymbol,
                                                        java.util.Date date)
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns stock price of a company for calculating values at a particular date.
        Specified by:
        getStockPriceForCalculatingValue in interface IStockAdapter
        Parameters:
        stockSymbol - of the company for which stock value needs to be found.
        date - for which price needs to be fetched.
        Returns:
        price of type double.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case price was not found or symbol is incorrect.
